column4: I foolishly misspelled my username on a new installation.  When I go to alter it as admin with the manage users and groups tool, username is grayed out and unalterable.  How do I fix this?
You need to be on a different user to do it.  If you have no other user, you can reboot and use the recovery console to do it.
I created another admin account to try and alter it from there but it was still grayed.  But you say I can do it from recovery?
you can, yeah.  usermod and stuff.
